Brad / Steve FYI I did speak to JD and he is aware of the situation and thinking through it
all. He did have a few comments FYI.

PX-0032

He wants to keep the overall deal as balanced per se as Lighthouse was. He made the
point and wants us to remember that Lighthouse was not a take-under valuation wise as
it valued the business at 14x EBITDA. He said he is solving for a similar "feel" to this
transaction and is not focused on $30M of EBITDA.

He also questioned whether we should do a convert and asked more about the holders
there. Would management be the majority of the holders or third party. He also
questioned whether Stifel would be a part of this convert (which I believe is to get to the
bottom of the situation referenced below). He is concerned about another Stifel situation so
we should avoid this structure if they will be involved.

I am catching up with Taylor as well, but wanted to give you guys a quick heads up on
initial thoughts / reaction.
